room_title: Escape room "Who Killed Bugsy Marlowe?" by EscapeWorks in Weirton
room_address: 3350 Pennsylvania Ave Suite D Weirton, WV 26062
room_description:
Bugsy Marlowe, the mobster who owned The Horseshoe Club (our previous game) has been killed in the lobby of the Dunwich Tower Hotel.  Police have five suspects in custody but must release them in an hour unless you can figure out who pulled the trigger.

Think of it as a living game of "Clue" built as an escape room! This one is a "thinker!"

With this game, we allow you to select your preferred level of difficulty when you book.

ALL of our games are completely designed and built in-house. No franchise designs here!
